title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.125 - Poisonous solids, Class B, referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.125 - Poisonous solids, Class B, referenced to this section

State Regulations

Poisonous solids, Class B, listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section, are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 2000 pounds gross
weight, regardless of size of containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.125

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
